SilverShop

MENU

Open source e-commerce module for SilverStripe Framework

Download Learn more

Latest Release: 2.3.1 (20th Feb 2017). Release Notes

Responsive

Built using HTML5/CSS3 and jQuery, and built using one of the world's most powerful CSS frameworks available, Bootstrap out of the box or customize with your own templates.

Extensible

Tailor your shop to your needs. SilverShop has a wide range of supported extensions including Coupons, Shipping, Tax and PDF Invoices. Easily extend the modules to suit your business.

More Features

Open Source

SilverShop and supported modules are released free under the same BSD License as the SilverStripe framework. With an active community, you can be sure of support and regular updates.

Support

  • Latest News

    SilverShop 2.3.1 Released

    We've just released 2.3.1 of SilverShop. This fixes a bug (regression) where the variation-form was no longer displayed in cart. SilverShop 3.0 which offers support for SilverStripe 4 is now in the works.
